alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 28 at 11:56AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: .Heavy rains in the Susitna Basin have caused flooding on the Susitna River and its tributaries. Additional rainfall expected through midweek will continue flooding in the area. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Including the following area, Yentna, Skwentna and Susitna Rivers and their tributaries. * WHEN...Until 800 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1137 AM AKDT, river levels on the Skwentna, Yentna and some locations on the Susitna Rivers were continuing to rise. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood People in the advisory area should expected elevated river levels and prepare for flooding and to move property to higher ground.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
